version_description: Minor bug fixes
Enabling Touch ID and other small fixes
Small bug fixes

Access E.ON Rewards
Join our rewards scheme to earn points and exchange them for high street gift vouchers or Tesco Club card points.
Receive alerts giving you important information about your E.ON account.

We’re continually improving our app to make managing your account easier.

This update fixes a number of issues including:

- A problem which stopped users from opting-in for push notifications
- An error where badge notifications were not working correctly
- Swipe-to-delete functionality on messages within the app
You’ll now only need a minimum of 100 E.ON Reward Points to exchange for a £1 gift voucher that you can spend on the high street and in some hotels

It’s no longer possible to opt into Rewards anymore as the scheme’s ended, but if you’re on a fixed tariff we sold between 6 December 2013 and 6 December 2016 you could be entitled to a one-off lump sum of points.Check out eonenergy.com/rewards.
If you’ve got remaining points, you can still exchange them through the app or our website.

You might notice our app now looks a bit more vibrant. We’ve also improved the layout so now it’s even easier for you to find all your account information in one place. Meanwhile the new dashboard is your go-to for quick and easy tasks like checking your most recent bill or meter readings.

UPDATE 11/05: We’ve fixed some issues that have affected our new App.

You might notice our app now looks a bit more vibrant. We’ve also improved the layout so now it’s even easier for you to find all your account information in one place. Meanwhile, the new dashboard is your go-to for quick and easy tasks like checking your most recent bill or meter readings.

UPDATE 19/07: We’ve fixed some issues that have affected our new App.

You might notice our app now looks a bit more vibrant. We’ve also improved the layout so now it’s even easier for you to find all your account information in one place. Meanwhile, the new dashboard is your go-to for quick and easy tasks like checking your most recent bill or meter readings.

UPDATE 03/08: We’ve fixed some issues that have affected our new App.

You might notice our app now looks a bit more vibrant. We’ve also improved the layout so now it’s even easier for you to find all your account information in one place. Meanwhile, the new dashboard is your go-to for quick and easy tasks like checking your most recent bill or meter readings.
E.ON Rewards has closed and it’s no longer possible to exchange your E.ON Reward Points through our app. For more information visit eonenergy.com/rewards.
Added support for iPhone X and Face ID
Bug fixes
Updated Images

Our latest App update now let’s our residential customers:

• Book a smart meter appointment
• Renew your current tariff or switch to a new one
• See the energy you use and learn how to make the most of it

Update or download now and take more control of your energy.
We’ve fixed an issue that some of our users were experiencing with Touch and Face ID.
We’ve carried out some essential background maintenance on our App. To ensure you can still use it, please download this latest version.

Our latest App update has a new home page design and now let’s our Residential customers:

•Manage their Direct Debit
•Download a PDF of their Bill
•See details of their smart meter installation appointment
•Timeline of recent activity

Update or download now and take more control of your energy.
Our latest App update fixes a few small issues with our new dashboard design and has some additional information for Smart Pay As You Go users.
We have fixed a bug which was preventing some customers from logging in.
We’ve now added Live Chat and Message functionality to our App to make it easier for you to contact us.

We use notifications to keep you updated on any changes to your account and the new things we’re working on to help you make the most of your energy. We’ve added new functionality to let you choose if and how you want to receive these notifications.

We regularly update our app to improve your experience. Get the latest version of our app for all available features and improvements, and if you enjoy your experience, please consider taking a few minutes to give our app a review. Thank you for choosing E.ON!

Welcome to the latest version of the E.ON App.

In this update, we've:

- Updated our dashboards for B2B customers
- Improved the overall app experience for new customers

If you love using the E.ON App to manage your account, please consider taking a few minutes to leave a review, even if you've already done so for a previous version! Thank you for choosing E.ON

We regularly update our app to improve your experience. Get the latest version of our app for all available features and improvements, and if you enjoy your experience, please consider taking a few minutes to give our app a review. Thank you for choosing E.ON!

Those new to E.ON can now track the progress of their energy switch and share opening meter readings for an accurate first bill. We've also made some general design improvements to tidy up a few areas which were in need of a spring clean.
